title: C¨¦dric Chouviat: French police investigated over death of delivery driver
title_page: C¨¦dric Chouviat: French police investigated over death of delivery driver - BBC News
maintext: This month, mass protests against police brutality have been held all over the world, after the killing of George Floyd by police in Minneapolis on 25 May. In a parallel with Mr Chouviat's pleas for help, Mr Floyd was also heard saying "I can't breathe" as a police officer knelt on his neck.
